casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Calvin Sherwood WATTS. No. 132A16-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 12, 2016. John Keating Wiles, Raleigh, for Watts, Calvin Sherwood. Laura E. Crumpler, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Jon David, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 11th of May 2016 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 12th of May 2016."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 29th day of June 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
